Question:
Choose the correct alternative that will continue the same pattern and replace the question mark in the given series.

1, 2, 6, 7, 21, 22, 66, 67, ?

A. 70
B. 134
C. 201
D. 301
Solution: The pattern is + 1, x 3, + 1, x 3, + 1, x 3, + 1,.....So, missing term = 67 x 3 = 201.

Question:
Choose the correct alternative that will continue the same pattern and replace the question mark in the given series.

0.5, 0.55, 0.65,0.8,?

A. 0.9
B. 0.82
C. 1
D. 0.95

Choose the correct alternative that will continue the same pattern and replace the question mark in the given series.

0, 2, 3, 5, 8, 10, 15, 17, 24, 26, ?

A. 28
B. 30
C. 32
D. 35
Solution: The given sequence is a combination of two series :I. 0, 3, 8, 15, 24, ? and II. 2, 5, 10, 17, 26The pattern in each one of I and II is + 3, + 5, + 7, + 9, .....So, missing term = 24 + 11 = 35.

Question:
Choose the correct alternative that will continue the same pattern and replace the question mark in the given series.

11, 13, 17, 19, 23, 25, ?

A. 26
B. 27
C. 29
D. 37

Choose the correct alternative that will continue the same pattern and replace the question mark in the given series.

5, 2, 7, 9, 16, 25, ?

A. 41
B. 45
C. 48
D. 52
Solution: Each term in the series, except the first two terms, is the sum of the preceding twoterms.So, missing term = 16 + 25 = 41.
